dr.evomodel.coalescent
Class BayesianSkylineLikelihood

java.lang.Object
  dr.inference.model.AbstractModel
      dr.inference.model.AbstractModelLikelihood
          dr.evomodel.coalescent.OldAbstractCoalescentLikelihood
              dr.evomodel.coalescent.BayesianSkylineLikelihood
All Implemented Interfaces:
Units, Loggable, Likelihood, Model, ModelListener, StatisticList, VariableListener, MPISerializable, Identifiable, java.io.Serializable
public class BayesianSkylineLikelihood
extends OldAbstractCoalescentLikelihood

A likelihood function for the generalized skyline plot coalescent. Takes a tree and population size and group size parameters.

Version:
$Id: BayesianSkylineLikelihood.java,v 1.5 2006/03/06 11:26:49 rambaut Exp $
Author:
Alexei Drummond

Calculates the log likelihood of this set of coalescent intervals, given a demographic model.

getPopSize

public final double getPopSize(int groupIndex,
                               double midTime,
                               double[] groupHeights)
Returns:
the pop size for the given time. If linear model is being used then this pop size is interpolated between the two pop sizes at either end of the grouped interval.
